GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
net: broadcom: bcm4908_enet: update TX stats after actual transmission

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit 2adedc80faec243ede55355e57142110d6f46e08, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 4feffeadbcb2e5b11cbbf191a33c245b74a5837b. For more details please see the references link.
